configLangLabel: Map lang (Need page refresh to work)
configLandmarkOnClickLabel: Create a new marker on map click
howto1: Make a backup of your landmark file
howto2: Copy/paste your current landmarkfile content in "XML source"
howto4: (Optional) If you want to merge another file, copy/paste it in "XML source"
howto6: (Optional) Repeat for each file you want to add
howto9: Copy/paste new XML to your file
howto10: If you want a new clean state, click on "Delete ALL landmarks"
tipsAndTricks1: you can drag and drop the markers to move them
tipsAndTricks2: You can add a marker by clicking directly on the map (disabled by default)
tipsAndTricks3: You can rename a marker by clicking on it
tipsAndTricks4: You can delete a marker by clicking on it and then hit the "Delete" button
tipsAndTricks6: First layer control is regular map / satellite + labels
tipsAndTricks7: Second one is landmark type (misc, boss, mission ...)
tipsAndTricks8: XML output is ugly, Ryzom client doesn't care tho
tipsAndTricks9: If you really care, you can use a XML beautifier
duplicateXmlPopup: You are adding the same XML as last one, probably because you clicked multiples times on the add button. Are you sure this is what you want to do ?
deleteAllPopup: Are you sure you want to delete ALL landmarks ?
